block.monhun.supply_box.desc:
A blue box filled with
goodies to bring on quests!
Invaluable to many hunters.
block.monhun.delivery_box.desc:
A red box used to deliver
many quest and account items.
Invaluable to all hunters.
block.monhun.item_box.desc:
A yellow box used to store
many different hunter items.
Invaluable to all hunters.
item.monhun.gs_guild.desc:
A Great Sword that's seen
extended use for ages.
Good for beginners, too.
item.monhun.ls_guild.desc:
A Long Sword forged with Eastern
methods. Durable and resilient,
but requires regular upkeep.
item.monhun.sns_guild.desc:
A simple, yet functional
Sword & Shield beloved
by Hunters for ages.
item.monhun.db_guild.desc:
The most basic of Dual Blades
that opt for ease of use
over any sort of style.
item.monhun.hm_guild.desc:
The trusty weapon of an old
hunter before Hammers were
"in." Looks rather crude...
item.monhun.hh_guild.desc:
A musical weapon made from
iron. Extremely simple in both
form and function.
item.monhun.la_guild.desc:
A Lance for newcomers
made with lots of attention
to minute details.
item.monhun.gl_guild.desc:
A Gunlance that's inexpensive,
but durable. A good starter
weapon for any hunter.
item.monhun.sa_guild.desc:
A simple Switch Axe that serves
as the basis for most Switch
Axes. Has limitless potential.
item.monhun.cb_guild.desc:
A well-forged steel Charge Blade.
It was once used by a champion
in countless battles.
item.monhun.ig_guild.desc:
A glaive made of iron. Simple,
but it possesses all the features a
hunter could ask for.
item.monhun.lbg_guild.desc:
A Bowgun with a large frame,
perfect for beginners. Simple,
yet also a full-featured weapon.
item.monhun.hbg_guild.desc:
Tremendously powerful Heavy
Bowgun. Rightly called the
soul of modern technology.
item.monhun.bow_guild.desc:
A cheap, introductory Bow for
novice hunters. It comes with
arrows and a quiver.
item.monhun.book_of_combos_1.desc:
An introductory text for first-
time combiners. Improves your
combination success rate.
item.monhun.book_of_combos_2.desc:
An entry-level text. Owning
Book 1 and this improves your
combination success rate.
item.monhun.book_of_combos_3.desc:
An intermediate text. Owning
Books 1, 2, and this improves
your combination success rate.
item.monhun.book_of_combos_4.desc:
An advanced text. Owning
Books 1-3 and this improves
your combination success rate.
item.monhun.book_of_combos_5.desc:
A pro-level text. Owning
Books 1-4 and this improves
your combination success rate.
item.monhun.binoculars.desc:
Allows you to see farther
and observe from a distance.
item.monhun.potion.desc:
Restores a small amount of
Health.
item.monhun.mega_potion.desc:
Restores a moderate amount
of Health.
item.monhun.nutrients.desc:
Very slightly increases your
maximum Health level.
item.monhun.mega_nutrients.desc:
Slightly increases your
maximum Health level.
item.monhun.antidote.desc:
Removes all traces of poison
from your system.
item.monhun.immunizer.desc:
Boosts your natural ability
to heal.
item.monhun.dash_juice.desc:
Lets you run without tiring
for a short period of time.
item.monhun.mega_dash_juice.desc:
Lets you run without tiring
for longer than regular
Dash Juice does.
item.monhun.demondrug.desc:
Boosts your Attack by filling
you with -- guess what? --
demonic strength.
item.monhun.mega_demondrug.desc:
Boosts your Attack even more
than a regular Demondrug.
item.monhun.might_pill.desc:
Temporarily endows you with
the strength of a mighty god.
Potent!
item.monhun.armorskin.desc:
Boosts your Defense by turning
your skin as hard as rock.
item.monhun.mega_armorskin.desc:
Boosts your Defense even more
than a regular Armorskin.
item.monhun.adamant_pill.desc:
Temporarily makes your skin
as hard as adamant. Potent!
item.monhun.cool_drink.desc:
Provides temporary relief
from extreme heat.
item.monhun.hot_drink.desc:
Provides temporary relief
from extreme cold.
item.monhun.cleanser.desc:
Immediately removes any ice
or webbing on your body.
Clean as a whistle!
item.monhun.psychoserum.desc:
Temporarily sharpnes your
sixth sense and attunes you
to the ways of monsters.
item.monhun.herbal_medicine.desc:
Removes all traces of poison
and restores a slight amount
of Health.
item.monhun.max_potion.desc:
Fully restores Health and
maximizes the size of your
Health Gauge.
item.monhun.ancient_potion.desc:
Fully restores Health and
maximizes the size of your
Health and Stamina Gauges.
item.monhun.energy_drink.desc:
A Guild-approved beverage
that boosts your Stamina.
Helps shake off sleep, too!
item.monhun.lifepowder.desc:
Medicine made from compounded
Lifecrystals. Heals those within
range with a single touch.
item.monhun.dust_of_life.desc:
A medicine with strong curative
properties. Studied in secret,
it is said to restore youth.
item.monhun.catalyst.desc:
Works with other materials
to enhance their effects.
Cannot be used by itself.
item.monhun.gunpowder.desc:
A dangerous substance that
explodes when struck or heated.
item.monhun.lifecrystals.desc:
Mysterious crystals long
worshipped as a source of life.
item.monhun.tranquilizer.desc:
Medicine that works as an
anesthetic when combined.
item.monhun.yukumo_egg.desc:
A popular dish from Yukumo
Village. Known for its rich yolk
and how it melts in the mouth.
item.monhun.tanzia_chips.desc:
A nutritious snack made with
ingredients caught in Tanzian
waters. Tastes like seafood.
item.monhun.powercharm.desc:
An amulet that raises Attack.
Just carrying this gives you
demonic strength.
item.monhun.armorcharm.desc:
An amulet that raises Defense.
Just carrying this hardens
your skin like stone.
item.monhun.powertalon.desc:
A powerful amulet that
raises Attack. Made with
a Deviljho Talon.
item.monhun.armortalon.desc:
A powerful amulet that
raises Defense. Made with
a Deviljho Talon.
item.monhun.bbq_spit.desc:
Just what you need to cook
meat. A must-have item for
any hungry hunter.
item.monhun.raw_meat.desc:
Meat carved from a monster.
Can be cooked, combined, or
used to set a trap.
item.monhun.poisoned_meat.desc:
Raw Meat that poisons
whatever eats it. Makes
great bait for traps.
item.monhun.tinged_meat.desc:
Raw Meat that paralyzes
whatever eats it. Makes
great bait for traps.
item.monhun.drugged_meat.desc:
Raw Meat that puts whatever
eats it to sleep. Makes
great bait for traps.
item.monhun.rare_steak.desc:
Provides a small boost to
your Stamina. This one's
still red in the middle.
item.monhun.welldone_steak.desc:
Provides a moderate boost
to your Stamina. Meat done
right!
item.monhun.burnt_meat.desc:
Meat that has been burnt to
a crisp. It might boost your
Stamina, or it might drain it...
item.monhun.chilled_meat.desc:
Meat that cools the body,
wards off heat, and restores
a moderate amount of Stamina.
item.monhun.hot_meat.desc:
Meat that warms the body,
wards off the cold, and restores
a moderate amount of Stamina.
item.monhun.mosswine_jerky.desc:
Dried Mosswine meat. The more
you chew it, the more flavorful
and juicy it becomes.
item.monhun.whetstone.desc:
A standard-sized Whetstone.
Use it to restore a weapon's
Sharpness.
item.monhun.old_pickaxe.desc:
A cheap pickaxe with an
easily nicked blade.
item.monhun.pickaxe.desc:
A pickaxe with a reasonably
strong blade.
item.monhun.mega_pickaxe.desc:
A pickaxe tempered with steel.
This one won't nick easily.
item.monhun.old_bug_net.desc:
A cheap net for catching bugs.
It tears easily.
item.monhun.bug_net.desc: A durable net for catching bugs.
item.monhun.mega_bug_net.desc:
An extremely durable net
for catching bugs. This one
is made to last.
item.monhun.boomerang.desc:
An unusually-shaped weapon
from abroad that returns to
its user when thrown.
item.monhun.throwing_knife.desc:
A standard throwing knife.
Flies straight and true.
item.monhun.poison_knife.desc:
A throwing knife with a venom-
coated blade. Poisons targets.
item.monhun.sleep_knife.desc:
A throwing knife that has been
dusted with sleeping agents.
item.monhun.paralysis_knife.desc:
A throwing knife coated with
toxins that paralyze a target.
item.monhun.tranq_knife.desc:
A throwing knife used to capture
monsters ensnared in traps.
item.monhun.bomb_casing.desc:
A base material for making
hand-thrown bombs.
item.monhun.paintball.desc:
Toss this scented paint at a
monster to mark it, allowing
you to track its position.
item.monhun.flash_bomb.desc:
Flashes brightly on impact.
Toss this right under a
monster's nose to blind it.
item.monhun.sonic_bomb.desc:
A grenade-like item that
emits a high-frequency blast
of sound on detonation.
item.monhun.tranq_bomb.desc:
A hand grenade used to capture
monsters ensnared in traps. Can
be slammed against the ground.
item.monhun.deodorant.desc:
An item that cures Stench.
Releases a puff of deodorizing
smoke when thrown down.
item.monhun.smoke_bomb.desc:
Creates a large cloud of
smoke wherever it lands.
item.monhun.poison_smoke_bomb.desc:
Contains a toxic chemical.
Also popular as a household
bug bomb.
item.monhun.farcaster.desc:
Instantly transports you
back to base camp.
item.monhun.dung_bomb.desc:
When thrown, releases a strong
odor which certain monsters
find repulsive.
item.monhun.dung.desc:
That's right: monster poop.
The odor reveals (too) much
about the monster's diet.
item.monhun.trap_tool.desc:
A must-have item for putting
together Pitfall Traps and
other kinds of traps.
item.monhun.net.desc:
A sturdy net able to support
a certain amount of weight
without breaking.
item.monhun.pitfall_trap.desc:
A trap for catching certain
large monsters. It is
tripped by a heavy weight.
item.monhun.shock_trap.desc:
A trap that immobilizes a target.
Use it to capture monsters.
item.monhun.barrel_lid.desc:
A small barrel lid.
There appears to be a
drawing on it.
item.monhun.barrel_bomb_l.desc:
A powerful bomb triggered
by external physical
impact.
item.monhun.barrel_bomb_l_plus.desc:
Upgraded Large Barrel
Bomb. Effective against
large mosnters.
item.monhun.bounce_bomb.desc:
Launches into the air when
set. This modified bomb
requires skill to use.
item.monhun.bounce_bomb_plus.desc:
An improved version of the
Bounce Bomb. Requires some
skill to use.
item.monhun.huskberry.desc:
A berry that is hollow on
the inside. Tough enough to
grow just about anywhere.
item.monhun.bone_husk.desc:
Used as a bone ammo casing.
Produces sturdier results
than a Huskberry.
item.monhun.empty_phial.desc:
A regular old empty phial.
Nothing more, nothing less.
item.monhun.worm.desc:
A fishing lure. Wriggles
underwater, enticing those
fishies to bite.
item.monhun.mega_fishing_fly.desc:
A fly lure that causes a
feeding frenzy no matter
what fish is biting.
item.monhun.frog.desc:
A fishing lure. The ideal bait
for certain aquatic monsters.
item.monhun.sushifish_bait.desc:
A nugget-shaped fishing
lure that makes Sushifish
go "mmm."
item.monhun.burst_bait.desc:
A fishing lure with chum that
makes fish that rupture
upon death go "mmm."
item.monhun.goldenfish_bait.desc:
A nugget-shaped fishing lure
that makes Goldenfish and
Brocadefish go "mmm."
item.monhun.field_horn.desc:
Used to attract certain
monsters -- blow at your own
risk. May break when used.
item.monhun.health_flute.desc:
Restores Health to those who
hear it. May break when used.
item.monhun.antidote_flute.desc:
Eliminates poison in the
blood of those who hear it.
May break when used.
item.monhun.demon_flute.desc:
Increases the strength of
those who hear it. May
break when used.
item.monhun.armor_flute.desc:
Bolsters the defenses of
those who hear it. May
break when used.
item.monhun.garbage.desc:
Junk created when a
combination attempt fails.
item.monhun.honey.desc:
Sweet, golden honey. High in
nutritional value.
item.monhun.herb.desc:
Restores a very small amount
of Health. Not very flavorful
item.monhun.antidote_herb.desc:
A plant used in antidotes.
It sometimes cures poison
when eaten by itself.
item.monhun.ivy.desc:
A lightweight and
extremely strong plant.
item.monhun.sap_plant.desc:
A plant with leaves coated
in sticky sap. Difficult
to remove once attached.
item.monhun.felvine.desc:
Melynxes' favorite food --
they just have to steal it.
item.monhun.gloamgrass_root.desc:
Possesses antidotal agents,
but it will not work by itself.
item.monhun.hot_pepper.desc:
Blazingly spicy. Sure, it'll
warm you up, but it's too
hot to handle on its own.
item.monhun.snow_herb.desc:
A radiant plant admired for
the lovely white patterns on
its leaves. It's as cold as ice.
item.monhun.blue_mushroom.desc:
Rare mushroom with a
power-enchancing effect.
item.monhun.nitroshroom.desc:
A hard-to-find mushroom
with the power to generate
blazing heat.
item.monhun.toadstool.desc:
Logic says not to eat this
poisonous fungus, but don't
write it off completely.
item.monhun.mopeshroom.desc:
A mushroom that contains a
Stamina-stealing constituent.
item.monhun.exciteshroom.desc:
This one has a very strange
aroma... But is it edible?
Only one way to find out.
item.monhun.dragon_toadstool.desc:
A dangerous fungus
said to draw the life
out of people. Beware.
item.monhun.paintberry.desc:
A berry with a shocking hue
and an overwhelming scent.
Look out: it WILL stain!
item.monhun.might_seed.desc:
Temporarily raises your
Attack when ingested by
improving energy flow.
item.monhun.adamant_seed.desc:
Temporarily raises your
Defense when ingested by
hardening tissue.
item.monhun.nulberry.desc:
A mysterious berry that cures
various Blights and also
protects from unknown viruses.
item.monhun.dragonfell_berry.desc:
A mysterious berry, rumored
since ancient times to be
loathed by dragons.
item.monhun.scatternut.desc:
A nut that violently ejects
its contents when struck.
item.monhun.needleberry.desc:
A berry covered with needle-
like thorns. Used as a
material for ammo.
item.monhun.latchberry.desc:
A berry with spiral grooves.
It spins when it falls to
firmly embed itself in soil.
item.monhun.bomberry.desc:
A berry that explodes when
struck.
item.monhun.stone.desc:
A small rock.
Can be thrown.
item.monhun.iron_ore.desc:
Ore that can be smelted
into metal and used for
many different purposes.
item.monhun.earth_crystal.desc:
Crystallized microbes which
are prized as an abrasive
when forging weapons.
item.monhun.machalite_ore.desc:
An ore that yields better
metals than Iron Ore.
Used to make Machalite.
item.monhun.ice_crystal.desc:
Ice that will not melt at
room temperature. Can be
used to create denser ore.
item.monhun.bealite_ore.desc:
An ore that contains high
amounts of gold. Can be used
to create stronger metals.
item.monhun.lightcrystal.desc:
An extremely hard substance
with a faint glow. Sometimes
used for crafting tools.
item.monhun.dragonite_ore.desc:
An ore that yields metal
superior to that of Machalite.
Rare and valuable.
item.monhun.firestone.desc:
Combusts even at room
temperature. Its high heat can
be used to fuse materials.
item.monhun.carbalite_ore.desc:
An ore still being researched.
It yields even better metal
than Dragonite.
item.monhun.novacrystal.desc:
A brightly glowing crystal.
Extremely hard, it's also
used to make armory tools.
item.monhun.fucium_ore.desc:
Ore composed of a mysterious
metal; capable of fusing nearly
any two materials together.
item.monhun.firecell_stone.desc:
A magma-like deposit that
only trained hands can
properly work with.
item.monhun.aquaglow_jewel.desc:
An indispensable item used
in Decorations.
item.monhun.sunspire_jewel.desc:
An indispensable item used
in Decorations.
item.monhun.bloodrun_jewel.desc:
An indispensable item used
in Decorations. A shame that
these are so high-end.
item.monhun.lazurite_jewel.desc:
An indispensable item used
in Decorations. This one
doesn't come along often.
item.monhun.armor_sphere.desc:
Reacts uniquely to heat.
Fuse this to equipment to
increase its strength.
item.monhun.armor_sphere_plus.desc:
Fuse this high-quality Armor
Sphere to existing equipment
to increase its strength.
item.monhun.advanced_armor_sphere.desc:
A dense, rigid Armor Sphere.
Rare, but enables higher-
level equipment upgrades.
item.monhun.hard_armor_sphere.desc:
A thick, dense Armor Sphere.
Use this precious rarity to
push equipment to the limit.
item.monhun.heavy_armor_sphere.desc:
A thick, dense Armor Sphere.
Use this precious rarity to
push armor to the limit.
item.monhun.mystery_charm.desc:
A modest good luck charm.
What does it do? Finish the
Quest and you'll find out.
item.monhun.shining_charm.desc:
A curious good luck charm.
What does it do? Finish the
Quest and you'll find out.
item.monhun.timeworn_charm.desc:
A powerful good luck charm.
What does it do? Finish the
Quest and you'll find out.
item.monhun.whetfish.desc:
A fish with a dorsal fin
hard enough to be used
to sharpen weapons.
item.monhun.sushifish.desc:
A fatty fish that can restore
a small amount of Health.
Helps cure Bleeding.
item.monhun.sleepyfish.desc:
A fish that contains
sleeping agents.
item.monhun.pin_tuna.desc:
A fish with jaws covered in
tiny, needle-like spikes.
item.monhun.speartuna.desc:
A giant fish that's both rare
and valuable. It looks like it
could be used for something...
item.monhun.popfish.desc:
A fish that literally pops
when it dies.
item.monhun.scatterfish.desc:
A fish that splits into
little pieces when it dies.
item.monhun.burst_arowana.desc:
A fish that bursts open when
it dies.
item.monhun.bomb_arowana.desc:
A fish that explodes when it
dies.
item.monhun.glutton_tuna.desc:
A fish that eats anything --
allowing you to sometimes
get items from its stomach.
item.monhun.gastronome_tuna.desc:
An enormous Glutton Tuna.
Will eat anything, no
matter the size.
item.monhun.ancient_fish.desc:
A precious fish; almost
every part can be used as
material.
item.monhun.small_goldenfish.desc:
A small, rare, gold fish.
Commands a high price.
item.monhun.wanchovy.desc:
A fish that can induce
exhaustion.
item.monhun.insect_husk.desc:
The remains of a dead
insect.
item.monhun.godbug.desc:
An insect said to live
for a thousand years.
item.monhun.bitterbug.desc:
A sharp-tasting bug with innate
healing abilities. Eat one for a
50% chance of curing Poison.
item.monhun.flashbug.desc:
An insect that emits
a powerful flash when
it dies.
item.monhun.thunderbug.desc:
An insect that emits
electricity when struck.
Has many applications.
item.monhun.stinkhopper.desc:
A grasshopper with a foul odor.
Make fishing lures with it; its
scent drives explosive fish wild.
item.monhun.snakebee_larva.desc:
An unusual larva to make
fishing lures with; its scent
drives the best fish wild.
item.monhun.carpenterbug.desc:
Uses viscous fluids and sharp
jaws to construct ant hills
that are a sight to behold.
item.monhun.shiny_beetle.desc:
An insect with dazzling wings.
Its hard shell is often used
as an abrasive.
item.monhun.killer_beetle.desc:
This insect's hard shell is
often used as an abrasive.
item.monhun.hercudrome.desc:
Said to be the world's
strongest bug. Used in
forging and other things.
item.monhun.king_scarab.desc:
The royal class of the
scarabs, with a hard shell
and lustrous wings.
item.monhun.rare_scarab.desc:
A rare and valuable insect
that greatly assists in the
bonding of metals.
item.monhun.monster_bone_m.desc:
A nicely-sized bone. Strong
yet flexible, it's as reliable
as steel and wood.
item.monhun.monster_bone_l.desc:
Wyvern bone needed to craft
larger items. The right item
will fuse this to a shell.
item.monhun.mystery_bone.desc:
A weathered bone.
Not sturdy enough
to use for crafting.
item.monhun.unknown_skull.desc:
Animal skull. So worn
and weathered, its
origin is unidentifiable.
item.monhun.monster_bone_plus.desc:
A high-quality monster bone.
Hard to obtain, but vital for
crafting powerful equipment.
item.monhun.monster_keenbone.desc:
A rare bone with a razor-
sharp tip that retains its
strength even when crafted.
item.monhun.monster_hardbone.desc:
A precious bone rarely yielded
by large wyverns. Difficult to
forge but prized for its strength.
item.monhun.elder_dragon_bone.desc:
A bone from an elder dragon.
It exudes the great majesty
of the beast.
item.monhun.avian_finebone.desc:
A bone from a Jaggi or other
bird wyvern. Small in size,
but high in quality.
item.monhun.brute_bone.desc:
The stout bone of a brutish
monster. An easy-to-work
material.
item.monhun.jumbo_bone.desc:
A large, thick bone.
Often cut apart in workshops
for use in crafting.
item.monhun.stoutbone.desc:
The large, sturdy bone of a
beast. Prized by blacksmiths
as a prime forging material.
item.monhun.dragonbone_relic.desc:
A curiously unfossilized
bone from a dragon that once
roamed these lands.
item.monhun.wyvern_fang.desc:
Used in Bowgun bullet points.
Gunpowder shatters these,
generating shrapnel.
item.monhun.wyvern_claw.desc:
Used in Bowgun bullet points.
Gunpowder triggers a blast
with a wide radius.
item.monhun.bird_wyvern_gem.desc:
A valuable gem that can be
harvested from bird wyverns. Said
to fetch a high price.
item.monhun.wyvern_gem.desc:
Throughout a wyvern's life,
impurities gather and form
this peculiar gem.
item.monhun.elder_dragon_blood.desc:
Contains an unknown
ingredient, the object of
much scholarly research.
item.monhun.pure_dragon_blood.desc:
Elder dragon blood that
contains a more potent mix
of its mysterious ingredient.
item.monhun.steel_egg.desc:
An egg of glittering steel.
Very valuable and rare,
but of no use to a hunter.
item.monhun.silver_egg.desc:
An egg of glittering silver.
Very valuable and rare,
but of no use to a hunter.
item.monhun.golden_egg.desc:
An egg of glittering gold.
Insanely valuable and rare,
but of no use to a hunter.
item.monhun.slickaxe.desc:
A small pickaxe that looks
useless for mining. It seems
to have a strange power...
item.monhun.screamer_sac.desc:
A monster organ that emits
an earsplitting sonic blast
when ruptured.
item.monhun.poison_sac.desc:
A monster organ that
contains a lethal toxin.
Handle with extreme care.
item.monhun.toxin_sac.desc:
A monster organ filled with
an extremely potent toxin.
Just touching it is dangerous.
item.monhun.paralysis_sac.desc:
A monster organ that contains
paralyzing neurotoxins.
item.monhun.omniplegia_sac.desc:
A monster organ filled with
potent neurotoxins. A single
touch can cause Paralysis.
item.monhun.sleep_sac.desc:
A monster organ that
contains a knockout powder
capable of inducing Sleep.
item.monhun.coma_sac.desc:
A monster organ that
contains dangerous powder.
One whiff can induce a coma.
item.monhun.flame_sac.desc:
A monster organ filled with
flammable powder. Handle
with extreme care.
item.monhun.inferno_sac.desc:
A monster organ filled with
powder that ignites if it so
much as touches air. Danger!
item.monhun.electro_sac.desc:
A monster organ that cane
store up electricity, which
is released on impact.
item.monhun.thunder_sac.desc:
A monster organ that can
store up large amounts of
high voltage electricity.
item.monhun.frost_sac.desc:
A monster organ that
contains a sub-zero liquid.
Handle with extreme care.
item.monhun.aqua_sac.desc:
A monster organ designed to
hold and preserve water.
item.monhun.torrent_sac.desc:
A monster organ designed to
hold and preserve copious
amounts of water.
item.monhun.dash_extract.desc:
A mysterious substance culled
from certain monsters that
increases endurance.
item.monhun.pale_extract.desc:
Has the ability to amplify the
effects of certain medicines.
item.monhun.monster_fluid.desc:
A liquid bugs suck from
monsters. Mixes with insect
gastric fluids to form adhesive.
item.monhun.monster_broth.desc:
A broth made from only the
thickest of a monster's
juices. Quite rich.
item.monhun.map.desc:
A complete field map that
shows terrain.
item.monhun.first_aid_med.desc:
Restores a small amount of
Health.
item.monhun.first_aid_med_plus.desc:
Restores a moderate amount
of Health.
item.monhun.ration.desc:
Restores a small amount of
Stamina.
item.monhun.mini_whetstone.desc:
A portable Whetstone for
restoring Sharpness to weapons.
item.monhun.ez_shock_trap.desc:
Immobilizes a target for
easy capture.
item.monhun.ez_pitfall_trap.desc:
Activates a pitfall to catch
monsters with.
item.monhun.ez_flash_bomb.desc:
A grenade-like bomb that
flashes brightly on impact.
item.monhun.ez_sonic_bomb.desc:
A grenade-like bomb that emits
a loud, high-frequency sound.
item.monhun.ez_max_potion.desc:
Fully restores Health and
maximizes your Health Gauge.
item.monhun.ez_lifepowder.desc:
Heals those within range
with a single touch.
item.monhun.ez_dust_of_life.desc:
Disperses on use and heals
serious injuries instantly.
item.monhun.ez_barrel_bomb_l.desc:
A powered-up Barrel Bomb L.
Just as potent as a Barrel
Bomb L+
item.monhun.ez_farcaster.desc:
Instantly transports you
back to base camp.
item.monhun.paw_pass_ticket.desc:
Deliver to end the Quest.
Maybe the Felynes will take
you home...
item.monhun.voucher.desc:
Redeem this for a special
Meal with stronger effects
than usual.
item.monhun.gourmet_voucher.desc:
Exchange this for a kingly
Meal. Both its flavor and
effects are top notch.
item.monhun.commendation.desc:
A ticket awarded for a
display of bravery. Collect
enough and it might pay off.
item.monhun.commendation_g.desc:
A ticket awarded for
great bravery. Collect
enough and it might pay off.
item.monhun.pawprint_stamp.desc:
Lynian paper currency, stamped
with a pawprint. The letters
written on it are unfamiliar.
item.monhun.wyvern_tear.desc:
Bitter tears wept by wyverns
on certain occasions.
item.monhun.large_wyvern_tear.desc:
Large, bitter tears wept by
wyverns on certain occasions.
monsterpart.rathalos.scale.desc:
A Rathalos scale. Wyvern scales
and shells such as this are
fundamental forging materials.
monsterpart.rathalos.scale_plus.desc:
An extraordinarily durable
scale carved from the body
of a Rathalos.
monsterpart.rathalos.shell.desc:
A shell piece comprised of
layered scales, making it
much harder than just one.
monsterpart.rathalos.carapace.desc:
A rigid Rathalos carapace.
Even harder than a normal
Rathalos Shell.
monsterpart.rathalos.webbing.desc:
This heat-resistant
material is often
used as armor lining.
monsterpart.rathalos.wing.desc:
A wing that has been removed.
Skilled artisans can craft it
into strong equipment.
monsterpart.rathalos.tail.desc:
The severed tail of a Rathalos.
It has any number of uses.
monsterpart.rathalos.plate.desc:
A searing tail scale. Hard
to come by and as fiery as
the wyvern it came from.
monsterpart.rathalos.ruby.desc:
A rare, precious gem from
inside a wyvern. Almost
too nice to use.
monsterpart.rathalos.wingtalon.desc:
A talon that grows on a wyvern's
wing. Break it off in battle and
you may just be rewarded.
monsterpart.rathalos.marrow.desc:
Recent advances allow this
marrow to be extracted. It
ignites on air contact.
monsterpart.rathalos.medulla.desc:
Only recently extractable
thanks to advances in carving
techniques. Difficult to process.
text.autoconfig.monhun.title: Minecraft: Monster Hunter Config
